resources.string: You are about to leave the quiz and you have not completed all the questions. Are you sure you want to continue?
Welcome to the testing page, If you are seeing this and this was not intended you are in the wrong spot.
You have not selected any answers, are you sure you wish to proceed?
Thank you for taking this quiz!
I am warning you, if you do not stop touching me I will scream
Congratulations on your perfect score! If you’d like to learn more about the quiz answers or have any questions, please seek out a staff member accompanying the Temi V3 robot.
Good effort! If you’d like more information about the quiz answers or have questions, don’t hesitate to speak to a staff member nearby with the Temi V3 robot.
Keep trying! If you’d like to understand more about the quiz answers or have any questions, a staff member with the Temi V3 robot is here to help.
I see you have done very well on my quiz. Here, have a chocolate on me. Please add your name so your glory can be saved and shown to all.
Welcome to the Hall of Fame. Come see the many people who have done my Quiz
Hang on, you are about to submit this quiz without completing all the questions. If you do this, your quiz will not be valid. Are you sure you want to do this?
Hang on, you are about to submit this question without adding an answer. Are you sure you want to do this?
You\'re quite far to my left! Would you like to come closer for a quiz?
You\'re in the midrange on my left. Would you like to do a quiz?
You\'re close on my left! Press the Start Button to start the quiz.
You\'re moving further to my left!
You\'re staying still on my left.
You\'re quite far to my right! Would you like to come closer for a quiz?
You\'re in the midrange on my right. Would you like to do a quiz?
You\'re close on my right! Press the Start Button to start the quiz.
You\'re moving further to my right!
You\'re staying still on my right.
You\'re far away from me! Would you like to come closer for a quiz?
You\'re in the midrange relative to me. Would you like to do a quiz?
You\'re close to me! Press the Start Button to start the quiz.
You\'re staying still in the middle.
Oh, you got it right? You want a medal or something?
Congratulations! You must be so proud... of answering a quiz question.
Wow, you did it! Now go do something actually challenging.
You got it right, big deal. Let’s not get carried away.
Perfect score, huh? Enjoy your moment of glory, it’s not lasting long.
Almost there... but not quite. Story of your life, huh?
Half right? So close, yet so far. Keep trying, maybe you\'ll get it one day.
Some of it was right, but seriously, you can do better than that.
You\'re halfway there! But no, that doesn\'t count as winning.
Partial credit? I mean, do you want a participation trophy or what?
Wow. How did you manage to get that wrong?
Not a single answer right? Impressive... in all the wrong ways.
Oh, you really went for zero, huh? Bold strategy. Let’s see how it works out.
All wrong? I didn’t even think that was possible with how easy these questions are. And yet, here we are.
You do realize that you are meant to select the correct answers, right?
